Next time I will have that in my burrito. This is another one of those places that you go to for the food and not the atmosphere. I don't like to give 5 stars for a review but Yelp doesn't allow 4.5. Not that there was anything that I felt needed improvement. This place will replace our usual neighborhood place.

dpsciwRejnx6rrE-0rNLEg.text: Fresh, delicious in a class by itself restaurant. The street tacos are phenomenal. So many options here. All of them good ones. You will not be disappointed.

nJ0YLqIXtc_7cZbX0jJJ0Q.text: This place is hella good!  Big burrito for really reasonable price!  I got the shrimp burrito - has nice huge pieces of shrimp and you customize whats inside. Get the jalapeno cremecheese stuff.  It tastes even better when you get it "wet"  One of the best mexican places in AZ!

4n4Kd0FOqBKgiPUDh9Glyg.text: Had the 5 street tacos and tried most of the meats. Their carnitas is amazing. Super authentic and a wide variety. It tasted just like what I had in Mexico!

N3_kuCktqccGUxzddY8zCA.text: Excellent food. Very Clean, inexpensive  Restaurant. Very helpful staff. They take the build-your-own taco concept to a whole new level with several meat choices and fixings. I highly recommend the beef in green chilli taco. This spicy beef is tender and flavourful. And for the spicy lovers, you must try the Habineros sauce.

JNQB1EjNRtlWGT0bnrAdKw.text: Great food, fantastic prices, and familiar faces make this place exactly what a local could want. I personally love going here multiple times per week for lunch as I work almost quite literally next door, and this place is somewhere I can get the same exact thing over and over again without ever getting tired of it! If you're looking for satisfying and delicious food. Then you've found the right place with Mucha Lucha!

8Bk9rQTvAyIOFfr3Kn7gqw.text: Nice little shop. They have a simple menu. The street tacos are worth the price. The rest of the menu items are a bit overpriced.

uZ5a59561n9af5taendqTQ.text: Food is pretty good, however staff make the menu a bit too customizable. I asked what normally goes in the quesadilla and he was like anything. ANYTHING? So I asked for corn, cheese, some onions, and cilantro. Came out good, but portions of the tortilla were burnt. The fries were good also.

hR-vqVpmg94D9r2NIqqSKQ.text: Best tacos in the state. The owner is so kind and sweet, and the food is absolutely amazing. I love out in Gilbert, and I'll still drive out to this specific Maskadore's location because the service is so good and the street tacos make my life complete. 10/10 would recommend!

6YT104V7EIQ-hYRjqMSrjQ.text: I debate on 3 or 4 stars. It's Chipotle/Subway style ordering. They have a chalkboard style menu of what type of food you can order (5 street tacos, 3 flour tacos soft, crispy tacos, burrito, etc) but don't specify the meat types so everyone was asking. They heat the tortillas up on the flat top to get the the browning on them which is delicious. It slows down the ordering process though and the line got pretty long.   Not really understanding the process, if you order flour tacos they ask if you want rice and beans. They mean on your taco, not on the side. Then they ask meat, there are 5-6 different ones to choose from. My husband and I liked the chipotle chicken the best. The carne asada seemed popular as well. It's hard to tell which meat is what because it's sitting in the sauce. When they take the meat a lot of the sauces get transferred which is good, but it makes the tacos SUPER soggy. I ordered the street tacos, they double the corn tortilla, heated it to make it more sturdy and the tortilla was still soggy and breaking. My 5 street taco plate just became a a meat, tortilla, soupy mess. If I ordered again, I'd do the chipotle chicken (less saucy) with 1 flour, 1 corn and 1 crispy.   The salsas are excellent. They don't explain them but ask hot, medium or mild. Hot is very hot, if you like heat I highly recommend it. If you order medium they ask if you want red or green.   I think we will try this place again. I probably won't do the street tacos again, it was good for a first visit because you get to try most of the meats and the tacos are small (5 is the right amount).   Overall, everyone in there seemed to be regulars and know what they liked. My husband and I were definitely newbies compared to everyone else! It's all made there, everyone was friendly and working very hard.

eFtsBNSMME4DiZJ8mwxDRQ.text: Don't let the outside fool you. In a strip mall. Very clean. Absolutely delicious fish burrito ! Option for black or pinto beans. I said I like Hots they brought an extra pepper to My table with a side of lime! YUMMY

3FCS8z9WxyFpeFaNTGPVxA.text: Great place for fresh tacos and burritos, I personally like the red chili beef taco, shrimp tacos, and green chili chicken. Also their horchata is the best I've ever had. Great food but hole in the wall.

iW5aPmY18IQp98TQEinzwQ.text: Fresh burritos, tacos and quesadilla to order. Nice blend of spices. Make sure to ask for salsa or your chips will be naked.

8sMK_P9gUEywkbCrXAdkWg.text: 5 starts on the taste of food, I unfortunately the price keeps going up and the food keeps gettin smaller but nevertheless the food is very good and authentic. I say keep the good work.

xLZy6Expurlj9vQNC1fL6A.text: The hype is real. Very casual place in a strip mall. As you walk in you hear salsa music playing and the friendly staff welcoming you in. The lady at the front was so nice and explained everything on the menu to us. Between us we tried the carne asada, shrimp, fish, and chicken. Each was better than the next! The carne asada, fish and shrimp are cooked fresh to order perfectly and the assortment of taco toppings was flavorful. The churro was crisp and filled with a sweet cream. Will definitely be back!

LBaAkvAAyHf3Eft85nOGoQ.text: The most authentic and tasty "fast-food" Mexican you will find! Everything is made in store, is fresh, and is so flavorful. I have tried all of their meats and my favorites are the chipotle chicken, which has a bit of heat and sweetness, and the barbacoa. The staff are friendly and helpful. This place will make you feel like you walked into a little taco shop in the heart of Mexico :)

FKVL44VJuitY9VJWcxCbbw.text: First of all the customer service is amazing here! I got shrimp street tacos and they were to die for!! And their chips and salsa are amazing..the spice/flavor profile is just so good. Omg yum! Highly recommend

noUtEv1iHECJ2ghskXaF9A.text: Such a pleasant surprise to have near home! I'm thrilled to have found this spot. It's now the only place I'll go for authentic tasting street tacos. Honestly the best shrimp tacos in town! I'm absolutely a fan!

5C3qvmtFDpSMfNCApX59hQ.text: My coworkers and I came here a few weeks ago as we have visited the location on Bell Rd several times. When looking on the menu we noticed they didn't have the papas rolled tacos that the other location offered. A simple call to the manager, aaannnd BOOM rolled papa's tacos were made promptly for us! Not only our favorite tacos, but they were clearly made by someone who cares to make his customers happy! We will for sure be returning... thank you for making our day!!

ezpekN65nPDGc3Zm0SpOgg.text: Came here to try this place out with a friend. Decent but reasonable distance to drive.  Small parking lot outside. Came around 2pm on Saturday. Was not busy. No waiting.  Inside is very simple. Ordering station is like Chiptole. You can see what you can get and they will add it into your order. Menu is pretty simple, but you have no idea the type of meat that they have unless you ask.   Food: I got the Meat burrito this time.  For the meat, I got the green chile pork roast. As this was too have some spice to it *not that spicy after tasting it).  The green chile pork does have good flavor and the meat is very moist and breaks downs easily when you bite into it. Pretty good.  They will heat up a big tortilla before letting you make your burrito I got pretty much everything on display, Including the Jalapeno cream cheese, but that cost around $1.48 extra, little bit expensive just for that. However, it did make the burrito taste different and it was good.  Guac sauce is also extra around that same price, but I did not get that.   I got 3 of their sauce in the burrito, which tasted good to me when it's mixed and you bite into the burrito.   Price: I think the burrito costed around $8.50 + tax, my total was around $9.60 or something because of additional charge of cream cheese.   Would recommend trying this place. They do have seafood taco and street tacos style. Will need to come back and try them as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Ueb4Ml9BIXDH50Jqk3jp9A.text: We got there 30 minute before close, and the line was still long. They were quick so we did not have to wait too long.   There were various meat selections. We did try them on 5 corn tacos and 3 flour tacos. I love their slightly pan seared flour tortillas. It gave different warm textures. The spicy chicken is my favorite even though it was so hot. The chicken is so juicy and naturally sweet. The beef with green chili is also tasty.  The best part is the Churro! We got 3 to go and they also gave us the dipping sauce for the churro. The warm crunchy churro covered with sugar cinnamon is so good to finish the meal with.

4xPwVLb59GQh5BYeztuSUg.text: Delish!  Today my co-workers and I dined at Mucha Lucha Tacos.  I decided to get a Carne Asada burrito and my co-workers went with the burritoin a bowl.  After you select your meat, it is warmed up on the grill then you get to choose whatever topings you would like in your burrito.   There is a large variety of topics to choose from,   Rice, sour cream or a chipotle sour cream.  All our entrees were absolutely delicious.  The meat was flavorful and tender as was the rest of the toppings. I can't wait to visit again and try other menu items.  The service is great, the prices are reasonable, and the food is delicious. Would return in the future.

uTc3vXKDFFYAe-YM47p7aw.text: Good street tacos. Meat choices are more stewed, not grilled. Choice of toppings.  Spicy!

Jln7kuUvo-VDZsKnD7ANtA.text: Wow this place serves amazing food.  Everything was so fresh in my carne asada tacos and the habanero salsa is the bomb.  Make sure to try their quesadilla as it's the best I've had.  Great spot, nice and clean.  Service was fast and staff friendly.

630sLLSkSmarMAIiCIiQmQ.text: The carne asada and carnitas tacos were fantastic! The chicken was just okay. Will definitely go back and try more items

XhxM1jzxqQtZ_zL1oLi1VQ.text: I love Mexican food.  Often I drive miles to check out hole in the wall joints.  This is one such place.  I have been coming here for over two years.  The food is to die for.  Lots of choices.  Earlier today I stopped by as my hankering for good Mexican fare was driving me crazy.  I ordered the Wet Burrito.  It was heaven.  This is a very large serving for my appetite. But I polished it off in short order.  The beef was so delicious.  The sauce was to die for. I soaked each bite in this heavenly sauce.  I like my Mexican food spicy. So I ordered a couple of seared jalapenos (free) with my meal. Oh my God. What a perfect complement to this spectacular burrito.  So why only 4 Stars: Every time I have eaten here the language barrier is a hill to climb.  The staff is English-challenged and I am Spanish-challenged.  Other than that what a terrific place.

aHhjWCLGpre63cI4vsDDag.text: Came in after a meeting - I'm not usually in this area. But wow- blown away by the delicious shrimp tacos!

I0z4H4yvF1uXZ4CCNTPFbg.text: Authentic street tacos, great spicy habanero salsa and flavorful meat! The red and green chili were my favorite, but there wasn't one flavor I wouldn't order again. Service was fast and friendly. I can't wait to try more of what they have to offer. This is a great hole in the wall!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Want some authentic street tacos?!

cGCcMzzAdTXCtzOc1sDijg.text: Exactly what you expect from a local place that serves more authentic Mexican food than the Americanized places all over the place.  You choose your ingredients, they make everything fresh, the decor is fun, the people are nice.  It's awesome!  Glad I stopped in.  In fact, it's taking all my strength to not head back there right now to try the breakfast burros.  Ok..I give....headed out.....peace out....

HU_0FfViA87z3bkZqpL_sw.text: This place has just changed my life in the best place possible... I've had it Two times now and the second time sealed the deal. Best tacos ever.

H5OoKVWlwmd1rP6xpi_0yg.text: Amazing food. I ordered the "El Jefe" burrito and when I saw them put the ingredients (chorizo, carne asada, bacon, egg, cheese, beans, rice) onto the grill, I assumed that they were making several.  To my amazement, it was ALL for my burrito (I'm still amazed that they crammed all of that into a tortilla).  Great taste, and beware: they are NOT messing around with the salsa!  I got the green tomatillo which I assumed was mild, and upon grabbing a big dip onto my chip, flew into a coughing/sneezing fit (in a good way). :)

8uXfdcUhtSBNCsJaXT7eYA.text: A lot of options here, so tried 5 different meats on my street tacos. Great salsa, good spicy levels and the owner was so friendly! I eat a lot of Mexican food and this is one of the best I've had!

50mrZhvrYhN8tZgje9bc6g.text: Great customer service! Loved the surf and turf burrito! Street tacos were delicious too.

9gLnrDTGv51jdu1_wpwZYQ.text: The fish tacos I've been searching for!!! It's so hard to find good fish tacos, and especially ones that aren't fried or breaded. I cannot wait to come back.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fish taco

raMQO7hRaqnjONVXEoOLEA.text: Loved this place! Cute, clean and simply delicious! We tried the chicken taco, barbacoa and a pork. There were 4 types of chicken, 3 pork and 3 beef. Then...soooo many choices of toppings. The staff was friendly and the prices were fair. Check it out for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. There are quite a few Luchedor paintings on the wall as long as some masks. So cute!!

5G970AvCk4uuDgZZmy7eJg.text: Authentic. Clean. Great prices and smiling faces. This is my new spot. Everyone should give this place a try.

1CmXaxtxcjGZLH43_P-I5w.text: I'm pretty sure this used to be another Mexican food place a few years ago, because I definitely had been in there before. However, it was before it was Mucha Lucha with its amazing glittery luchador murals and counter tops. The man and woman who helped me were both very nice and didn't look at me weird when I asked for cabbage in my breakfast burrito. It's set up like a Subway or Chipotle, where you order what you want and they make it for you with the ingrediants you choose. Since it was still early, I got the carne asada breakfast burrito which included egg, beans, cheese, and whatever other fillings and sauces you wanted. it was pretty big and was served wrapped in foil with a handful of chips. I also got a Mexican Coca-Cola. A very filling, delicious breakfast for under $10. I almost didn't finish it!  It seemed to be a favourite spot of local construction teams, so be prepared to share the spot with a crowd of loud, dusty guys. But that's also how you know it's got to be good!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Carne asada breakfast burrito and Coke.
Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Lklqhzuv3K-DNWcGRIOdWA.text: Now this is Mexican Food! I got the 5 street taco's and they were awesome! Everything is made fresh & U custom order! Yummy!!

ZCsaOi8Sk0UCyyOZAN1w3g.text: We tried this place on a whim, and now it is part of our regular lunch rotation each week. The food is excellent, inexpensive and is prepared right in front of you. tacos, burros, quesadillas, or mix it all up in a bowl, its all fantastic, but my favorite is the vinegar chicken, in street taco fashion. Close second is JJs Quesadilla with carne asada. It looks rough from the outside, but head right in and you will be happy you did!

Fr_L041cOe4dAz-yKzAlCw.text: Great random find for a filling and tasty lunch! Highly recommend you try the Surf and Turf burrito!!

lywUJFTu7Z_sVGwRG5wl_A.text: I love this place. I usually get my food to go because it's not really a sit down restaurant. The staff is friendly and the food is excellent. One of the best taco places in the South Scottsdale area.

XmEtVtJUjeWdprv8jc_hrg.text: This is a diamond in the rough of Mexican food with in Scottsdale. I tend to shy away from shrimp tacos in Arizona for fear of subpar seafood but this was far from that. The shrimp was juicy, huge and flavorful! All the accoutrements were flavorful and authentic, we also had the breakfast burrito and it was just as amazing. The staff was beyond friendly and a tentative. I recommend the horchata as well! This place is a real Mexican food Chipotle style restaurant and I recommend it to everyone.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Build your own shrimp tacos

K17rk6C3nNZ3aR7o7QJ3sw.text: The burritos are made exactly to your liking (ordering is like Subway type) and the tacos don't disappoint. I especially like the homemade tortillas for the burritos and the fact that they serve black beans as well. Lastly, they also have horchata, mexican soda, tortilla chips & salsa, and churros. I wish I had a taco shop like this in my hometown in California.

4sd4e_NUSLoBjHB8XHmyAg.text: WOW! Absolutely phenomenal customer service. Food was delicious. Fresh made for you. Very clean (food and restaurant). Love the decor.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bean and cheese burrito enchilada style

_LwERdEntUWQc6STsEGouQ.text: I love this place! So many meats to choose from, bitchin' decor, and nice employees too. I've tried almost everything and have never been disappointed.  I miss living a block away from it.

cxQfpeDMcqhp2b2y0S5uww.text: This is a hidden gem!! There needs to be more Mexican places like Mucha Lucha in Scottsdale. The food is top notch authentic Mexican. Get the chipotle chicken chimichanga

vdvMorRBDxJM998akKXYLw.text: I went here for the first time a few days ago. I was skeptical at first. When we went in we noticed it was a very clean place and friendly staff. I ordered the surf and turf burrito it was excellent. They have a delicious cream cheese sauce. I got the guacamole salsa, it was a little too spicy for me but that's typical. I will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Surf and turf

BfE5_1tHGfwnMigS1beeSg.text: Not only were the spicy chicken tacos tasty, but the staff were a breath of fresh air. They gave us tasters of something not on their menu right now, they kept making sure I enjoyed the tacos. I will absolutely return and heavily recommend that you try the food! They will have you test the meat and almost anything you want to ensure you get what you want!

sdfKdZ1wxeLQNPsRf9DsYg.text: Very popular taco shop. They have a good selection of several types of meat marinated in different sauces/spices.  Very flavorful food.

97obc7um_1TubJpbdXYTfQ.text: I went here because the reviews are good. I was disappointed. First thing. I got the soft tacos and the portions were all over the place. Ok amount of meat but my girlfriend got tons more on her street tacos. Then when I selected my other ingredients the lady who was serving me just threw ingredients down on the plate impatiently. I asked for salsa, and she filled up two 2oz containers, but one she filled up only half way. Well guess what... each salsa container costs $.75.  Charging for salsa and not even filling the whole container up... not cool.  So we get to the register and she keeps hitting me charge after extra charge without explanation and I keep having to ask what "open food" charge is...  the experience was horrible. Will never be back.

piqTa1bzq70NMz8dArLrWA.text: Amazing Tacos! They are number one on Yelp for a reason! We got the street tacos and flour tacos. The meat is great and fresh!

uzeUorbep8AgCseEUOtzxQ.text: I've been to both the Broadway and Gilbert Mucha Lucha shops and loved every visit. There are many options as far as meat (asada, green chile and barbacoa beef, chipotle, vinagrette and red chicken, plain and red carnitas) and all are excellent so far...vegetarian option too...food tends to be a bit on the spicy side, but that's the way i like it

-0XR95gnGJMjIJ8Jb1IKew.text: So. Freaking. Good. Every time my boyfriend asks what I want for dinner my answer is this shop. So many different options and everything is super fresh and yummy  thank you so much Mucha Lucha!!!

tGp6Zl-L0fKzUlvUUdPiwA.text: This is great place and it gets busy so you might want to come a little early. The ingredients look better quality than most taco shops

wDNHFrHgVb9ZNKPWHk4q-A.text: Food is delicious and fresh. It's a must try mom and pop place. We'll definitely be back here.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Wet chimichangas are the way to go!

OXr3MeB_tob70Oriuk73oA.text: The best. So glad this place exists. Mucha is like a more traditional chipotle/taco shop. Great flavor, fresh ingredients, and traditional seasonings on their meats. You can't go wrong with the carne asadae, green chili or the surf and turf burrito. Pro tip: have them grill onions with your carne asada. Amazing.

kQ7GZRSZGo1yMsAV_B2k9Q.text: I ordered to go over the phone and told them I would arrive in 15 minuets to pick it up. I arrived about 20 minuets and they told me they had to throw out my food because it got to cold and I would have to reorder. I was excited to try it out but the purpose of calling ahead of time was to have the food ready not to wait again. Not recommended to order over the phone.

Acad33tZBAzQRw_D_oHZzg.text: Amazing.  The reviews speak for itself but let me tell you I love spicy and their mild kicked my ass.

O1Nus73aHd5Bdj42s8KoKw.text: I'm on a shrimp taco kick since my trip to Mexico. The jalapeno cream cheese is different but added a good flavor to the shrimp tacos. I also got rice and beans on mine (she asked, so I said sure). I ended up scraping most of it off and eating it separately since it made the taco super messy to eat. The shrimp does have a kick to it. Great hole-in-the-wall kind of joint with delicious food. This will definitely go in to the Mexican food rotation from now on!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Menu

QqrbIBfyFmXqQsTW5NoO-A.text: Love the food so much. Small place and I always see 1-3 people working but the food they put out is amazing. I really enjoy the carnitas tacos and the fresh ingredients. We order here at least once a month, sometimes up to 2 times a week. Very small shop but they make up for it in taste and flavor. Very nice people, support small businesses.   :)

IykuLgGyBsuor21j1PMjhQ.text: Excellent street Tacos! Tried 2 different meats; both great. They offer 3 different varieties of each chicken and beef. We had the surf and turf burrito. Plenty big for two adults and we thought it was great. Kids really enjoyed the street Tacos. Great stop if you're cruising the 101 by Scottsdale.

0YS4tKHiwrNAD6OoEDM8DA.text: Maybe I had higher expectations after reading the good reviews or maybe I'm still looking for my "California" Mexican food, but I was not impressed.  I'm giving 3 stars (more like 2.75 to be honest) because the service was friendly and the salsa was decent. I ordered a carne asada burrito and the tortilla was really tough and chewy and the carne asada was undercooked and didn't have much flavor.  I'd be willing to give them another chance, but I'd definitely order something else.

B-u8cKzfqBWUb9VXFZDirg.text: Excellent food and service ! Ordered some chicken tacos. The server let me sample the different kinds of chicken they had, and you can customize for each one! Lots of toppings to choose from and great prices too. Would definitely come back

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chipotle chicken tacos

dcg3adsn77GELEgMAqTMjg.text: Fun, fast, friendly, and tasty taco spot! I tried the 5 street tacos, and loved all of them except the Chiptole style which was a little too sweet and saucy for my taste. My friend ordered the 3 flour tacos with barbacoa, also very delicious. They're fast, all of the ingredients you could tell were freshly chopped and made. Their music is a little loud, but creates a fun atmosphere. I didn't try the guacamole, but from watching other people order after me, I don't think they charge extra for it, because they're quite liberal with all of the ingredients you ask for. Will definitely go back for tacos next time I'm in the neighborhood!

o5-rI-vlwkeImHOzwB5Sag.text: Amazing Mexican food, and great customer service. It's a small place but very cozy, we feel like home when we are there. They will also make you a fresh smoothie if requested.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fresh smoothie de chabacano. So refreshing.
Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Carnitas with rice and beans. I don&#39;t like carnitas but this carnitas are sooo delicious. Only ones I will eat.

yCQ-VW2WT8DoB4G2gkjIjg.text: Awesome wet burritos!  Place was great and food was awesome.  Love the decor!!  Would recommend this place for authentic flavour and presentation..

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

oE9R36KUD6g8iclfBiXUww.text: Friendly staff Clean Resturant Organized, Great spot for lunch meetings  Great Recommendation if your a bit choosy about choosing which dish to consume. :) pick them all!!

hdIaqbOVBbhpqHqqZPQGLA.text: Love their carne asada street tacos and mucha fries. Food is always fresh and the salsa is Spicy!!!

-EviMitcUsnzjA0sY74ExQ.text: If only it were always this easy to find insanely goos street tacos for a fair price. Simple menu, solid ingredients, classic Mexican sodas to go along with it. I watched two people clear through a 20 person line in about 10 minutes, they clearly know what they're doing. And did I mention the price? Definitely coming back.

lBu7fvUZXO4lT3l6Ptslog.text: I tried to eat here earlier today around 1 PM. While their website says they are opened, their door was clearly locked and someone was walking around inside. I tried to ask if they would be opening later on but the person inside just get shaking her head despite me asking a question. If you're going to close it would be nice to inform your customers or at least open the door for them instead of starring especially when some are driving quite a distance just to try your restaurant.

m79xomVALqWVLym7TVCBEQ.text: Good tacos and well priced although there aren't many people working behind the counter so it can take a minute depending on how busy they are. I definitely recommend trying the jalepeno cream cheese, yummy!!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fish tacos

hWCFVLW2k6J2LaN4bzB8MQ.text: Sucks. Small portions, overpriced, no taco Tuesday. Salsa is good.better places to choose from

c0qQxrFMgKGgq-3JLcGCbQ.text: This place is awesome! I had the surf and turf burrito, which was humongous and so fresh. It was probably 3-5 lbs of food . I also had the guacamole sauce and chips... So good! I will be coming back for a second time for sure during my one week starting in Arizona!

KIzxyQl8Q0-LS3KR4PPaag.text: Made a quick stop in here on a cross country drive since it was right next to the hotel and I could not be happier!  Ordered the 5 street tacos with everything and it is delicious!  Much cheaper then I expected as well for such fresh ingredients!  Definitely will come back next time I'm driving through Phoenix!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. 5 street tacos with everything!  2 steak and 3 red chicken!

QOijZS3yswZQWGEZKRtuqQ.text: I cant believe I have not reviewed Mucha Lucha yet! I eat here at least 3x a month. I always get the same thing because it is so good I always crave it. I found out I have a gluten allergy about 6 months ago and was pleased to find out that Mucha is gluten-free friendly. If you are very sensitive I would not recommend. However, I am not and I have never gotten sick after eating here. The carne asada is gluten free so I get a carne asada burrito bowl with rice, beans, toppings and some warmed up corn tortillas on the side. It was THE BEST. The owners and workers are always so nice and accommodating. Definitely has a family run vibe. My favorite take-away spot in the south scottsdale area by far.

lui93eBPIRuVEHHUKO8gAQ.text: This was hands down the best breakfast burrito I've ever had in my life ( el jefe ) we left pats run hangry and this cool joint popped up on yelp. If you haven't been here yet it's like chipotle for those who like real Mexican food not the gringo stuff. Everything was fresh, the servers were polite, the restaurant was clean, and we couldn't have left happier or fuller. I would most definitely suggest this to all my yelp friends and all of my real life friends too. Do yourself a favor and crush a burrito from here, I'm sure it's enough food for all day too because I don't think they know what a small serving size is here. We will be returning when we are in the area for sure. Also a small tip for those who like it extra hot, their habanero salsa has plenty of kick and it's not over bearing, step up to the plate because it's awesome.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. El Jefe is BOMB

Z414QknC4UYDGqKwU_C16g.text: So, I love Mexican food and I consider myself a connoisseur.  That said, this place has real Mexican food! I got the 5 street taco's and they were awesome! Everything is made fresh & you can custom order however you like.  If you are looking for yummy tacos, this is your place!!!

Fqip_N3zeXGCgZ4fkALSgA.text: Hands down the best shrimp and fish tacos around.  I ordered the 3 tacos, mixed it up with 2 shrimp and 1 fish.  The fish taco was a huge fillet and cooked to perfection.  This is your place if you like authentic tacos!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

3LaOcAgT_NIEfby-NL2qRg.text: I will start by saying that the food tasted good but the portion size of ingredients was extremely small. When I requested a little more cheese they literally put like 3 additional pieces of the shredded cheese on my street tacos. I noticed other people having the same order as me but their street tacos were so full it was hard for them to fold.  After seeing this several times it hit me that the difference between me and the other customers was that I am white and the others Hispanic.  I do not recommend this place to anyone who is NOT Hispanic.

pDoHDbrM2AMa_ZGbcGkxew.text: Simple, delicious tacos and burritos. I'm a big fan of the fish and shrimp tacos, and my husband can't get enough of the fajita burrito, wet style. The staff is super nice and friendly too. All in all, love this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

OdN9g7z8vQbbNNmH8yEflQ.text: I have to admit I was a tad nervous trying this place but my fears were completely out to rest. The breakfast burrito, tacos, and beef burrito we all got here were amazing. My breakfast burrito put all others to shame... it was very good, great portion sizes, good prices and everyone was very friendly. This definitely had that authentic taqueria feel and flavor... and I should stress that this is NOT a Mexican restaurant, it's a TAQUERIA. It's well worth checking out... the El Jefe is fantastic and when my folks come to town I will be taking them here!

CbIolgBqIxpQmZYF8X3rDA.text: Omg this place was beyond amazing. Best Mexican food ever, it taste just like my mother in laws. I had the meat burrito and it was beyond filling but more importantly it was delicious. BTW did I say it was delicious?! Omg definitely going back tomorrow before I head home to Cali.

E1q5BCkYtoubn4NlvwsBww.text: Kickass tacos and better burritos. Surf and turf burrito is my fave along with the street tacos. I love the hot habanero sauce.spicy!!!!

rJiyMkFGOlPVf92P7TBoFA.text: If you are looking for a great authentic Mexican cuisine you found it. I love this place from the amazing food to the Mexican wrestling theme. Great spot can't go wrong with anything on the menu.

LuAweDqgwH58d-r0DxLABQ.text: I looooove this place! Huge portions, great price! Chipotle style assembly of custom burritos, tacos and something chipotle doesn't have, chimichangas!!! So awesome I live close by.

photos.caption: Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Amazingly delicious meats to choose from. The green chili chicken has a good spicy kick
Photo of Maskadore's Taco Shop - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Really cool table

09jcmker9Sdk1kNC3u31Gg.text: Excellent food. First time being here and the staff was friendly and offered tastes of the meats and suggestions.  Food is fresh and flavor able.  I'm glad we found this taco shop and will be going back!

Kr6Lm3iMMxIYyIWwKzJwJQ.text: I picked up takeout from here tonight. It is a mom and pop restaurant. Reminds me of an authentic chipotle. I tried the different meats and really only liked one of the beefs (the green one) and loved the carne asada. I got the carne asada burrito and it was really good. It was huge so it will be my lunch tomorrow too. It also comes with a side of chips and salsa. Will definitely be back here.

Ef8iSoUxCeX4y6kwneumFg.text: Best Mexican food place in Scottsdale.  And what I mean by Mexican food is, when you eat here you feel like you are at someone's house who asks you, do you want tacos, or a burrito?  And they make your food fresh, made to order!  I love this place.  It's like if chipotle was 100% Mexican that is what this place is.  Assembly line style which is great.  My faves are:   Surf and Turf Burrito with beans, rice, cheese, cilantro and habanero salsa!  Shrimp tacos  JJ's Quesadilla

qDQppZokouGUet_6ffr2FQ.text: The reviews for this place were not wrong. The food was great and the staff was very accommodating with a few special orders we had. I had the barbacoa wet burrito with habanero salsa and it was darn tasty. My wife got an order of nachos with the green chili pork which wad also great. I would like to say that they made my wife nachos even though it wasn't listed on the menu. I will be back.
